amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-289 to clarify that the Bank's activities to support exports in energy efficiency technologies shall include activities to support exports in electric battery vehicles, batteries for electric vehicles, and electric vehicle charging infrastructure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-289 to clarify that the Bank's activities to support exports in energy efficiency technologies shall include activities to support exports in electric battery vehicles, batteries for electric vehicles, and electric vehicle charging infrastructure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Speier.
